title: Great player, not reliable.

fullText: imagine bought player sexy easy sounds led superb battery life amazing imagine 5 months started malfunction audio glitches cant hear audio jack loose decide seal yourself unfortunately arent screws player luckily 1year warranty call tech support theyll exchange price 30 stay product sony isnt doing doesnt mean screw customers faults pathetic
